Questions.Question: Which streaming service is known for 'Stranger Things'?
Questions.Explanation: 'Stranger Things' is a popular science fiction horror series exclusively available on Netflix since its release in 2016.

Questions.Question: What is the alias of the lead character in 'The Mandalorian'?
Questions.Explanation: The lead character in 'The Mandalorian' is known as Din Djarin, but is commonly referred to as Mando.

Questions.Question: Where is 'The Crown' set during its first season?
Questions.Explanation: The first season of 'The Crown' primarily focuses on Queen Elizabeth II's early reign in the United Kingdom.

Questions.Question: What is the title of the first episode of 'Black Mirror'?
Questions.Explanation: 'The National Anthem' is the first episode of 'Black Mirror,' featuring a dystopian twist on contemporary society.

Questions.Question: Which Emmy-winning show centers around the fictional Roy family?
Questions.Explanation: 'Succession' is a darkly satirical drama following the power struggles of the wealthy Roy family and their media empire.

Questions.Question: Which actress plays the lead role in 'The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel'?
Questions.Explanation: Rachel Brosnahan portrays Miriam 'Midge' Maisel, a housewife turned stand-up comedian in the acclaimed series set in the 1950s and 1960s.

Questions.Question: In 'The Witcher,' who does Henry Cavill portray?
Questions.Explanation: Henry Cavill stars as the monster hunter and protagonist Geralt of Rivia, based on the book series by Andrzej Sapkowski.

Questions.Question: Which actor plays the character 'Eleven' in 'Stranger Things'?
Questions.Explanation: Millie Bobby Brown brings the enigmatic and powerful character 'Eleven' to life in the hit series 'Stranger Things.'

Questions.Question: What is the name of the AI in 'Westworld'?
Questions.Explanation: Dolores, portrayed by Evan Rachel Wood, is both a central character and an AI within the complex and thought-provoking narrative of 'Westworld.'

Questions.Question: Which streaming service premiered 'The Boys'?
Questions.Explanation: 'The Boys' is a dark and irreverent take on superhero culture, available exclusively on Amazon Prime Video.

Questions.Question: In 'Ozark,' what illegal activity does the Byrde family become involved in?
Questions.Explanation: The Byrde family navigates the dangerous world of money laundering as they relocate to the Ozarks to escape a dire predicament.

Questions.Question: Which character becomes the 'Kingpin' in 'Daredevil'?
Questions.Explanation: Wilson Fisk, portrayed by Vincent D'Onofrio, transforms into the formidable criminal mastermind known as the 'Kingpin' in 'Daredevil.'

Questions.Question: What is the title of the app used for dating in 'Black Mirror'?
Questions.Explanation: In the episode 'Hang the DJ,' the dating app is named 'Coach,' which guides individuals through a series of relationships to find their ultimate match.

Questions.Question: Which character is the primary focus of the series 'Fleabag'?
Questions.Explanation: The series revolves around the complex and darkly humorous experiences of the titular character, played by Phoebe Waller-Bridge.

Questions.Question: In 'The Umbrella Academy,' who is Number Five?
Questions.Explanation: Aidan Gallagher portrays Number Five, a member of the dysfunctional superhero family with the ability to travel through time.

Questions.Question: Which actor portrays 'Pablo Escobar' in 'Narcos'?
Questions.Explanation: Wagner Moura delivers a captivating performance as the notorious Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar in the gripping crime drama series 'Narcos.'

Questions.Question: What is the main premise of 'The Haunting of Hill House'?
Questions.Explanation: The series delves into the psychological effects of supernatural events and haunting experiences on the fractured Crain family.

Questions.Question: Which individual leads the team in 'The Expanse'?
Questions.Explanation: As a key protagonist, James Holden assumes leadership as the captain of the Rocinante in the expansive and immersive narrative of 'The Expanse.'

Questions.Question: What is the main focus of 'Mindhunter'?
Questions.Explanation: The series delves into the early days of criminal psychology and criminal profiling in the FBI, focusing on the Behavioral Science Unit.

Questions.Question: Where does the dystopian society of 'The Handmaid's Tale' take place?
Questions.Explanation: The oppressive society depicted in 'The Handmaid's Tale' is situated in the totalitarian regime of Gilead, a theonomic military dictatorship.
